DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the performance of an investigational contact lens among contact lens wearers.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of a Silicone Hydrogel Lens
DOC.criteria: Currently wearing lotrafilcon A lenses in both eyes for a minimum of 5 days per week, 8 hours per day, for 3 months. Removes contact lenses daily or sleeps overnight in contact lenses (up to 30 consecutive nights) as prescribed by regular eye care practitioner. Able to achieve distance visual acuity of at least 20/40 in each eye with study lenses. Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply. Eye injury or surgery within 12 months prior to enrollment. Currently enrolled in any clinical trial. History of corneal refractive surgery. Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
